mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.title, e.description, e.views, e.created_at, e.created_by_email, e.duration_id, d.label AS duration, e.likes, e.file_path, e.language_level_id, l.level, l.label AS levelLabel, e.category_id, c.name AS category, e.external_id, e.status_id, s.status FROM core.exercise e LEFT JOIN core.language_level l ON e.language_level_id = l.id LEFT JOIN core.duration d ON e.duration_id = d.id LEFT JOIN core.status s ON e.status_id = s.id

SELECT e.id, e.title, e.description, e.views, e.created_at, e.created_by_email, e.duration_id, d.label AS duration, e.likes, e.file_path, e.language_level_id, l.level, l.label AS levelLabel, e.category_id, c.name AS category, e.external_id, e.status_id, s.status FROM core.exercise e LEFT JOIN core.language_level l ON e.language_level_id = l.id LEFT JOIN core.duration d ON e.duration_id = d.id LEFT JOIN core.status s ON e.status_id = s.id WHERE e.external_id = #{externalId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO core.exercise ( title, description, views, created_at, created_by_email, duration_id, likes, file_path, language_level_id, category_id, external_id, status_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{views}, #{createdAt}, #{createdByEmail}, #{durationId}, #{likes}, #{filePath}, #{languageLevelId}, #{categoryId}, #{externalId}, 1 )
